alert.note: Alert for Van Buren (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 21 at 8:33PM EDT until July 21 at 9:15PM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Rapids has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Van Buren County in southwestern Michigan... * Until 915 PM EDT. * At 832 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hartford, or 8 miles west of Paw Paw, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Paw Paw... Mattawan... Lawton... Decatur... Lawrence... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
